verses.verse: Where has your beloved <S%H1730><s%> gone, <S%H1980><s%> you fairest <S%H3303><s%> among women? <S%H802><s%> Where has your beloved <S%H1730><s%> turned, <S%H6437><s%> that we may seek him with you? <S%H1245><s%> Beloved

My beloved <S%H1730><s%> has gone down <S%H3381><s%> to his garden, <S%H1588><s%> to the beds <S%H6170><s%> of spices, <S%H1314><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> in the gardens, <S%H1588><s%> and to gather <S%H3950><s%> lilies. <S%H7799><s%>
I am my beloved <S%H1730><s%>'s, and my beloved <S%H1730><s%> is mine. <S%H7462><s%> He browses among the lilies, <S%H7799><s%>
You are beautiful, <S%H3303><s%> my love, <S%H7474><s%> as Tirzah, <S%H8656><s%> lovely <S%H5000><s%> as Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> awesome <S%H366><s%> as an army with banners. <S%H1713><s%>

Turn away <S%H5437><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> from me, <S%H1992><s%> for they have overcome <S%H7292><s%> me. <S%H8181><s%> Your hair is like a flock <S%H5739><s%> of goats, <S%H5795><s%> that lie <S%H1570><s%> along the side of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

Your teeth <S%H8127><s%> are like a flock <S%H5739><s%> of ewes, <S%H7353><s%> which have come up <S%H5927><s%> from the washing; <S%H7367><s%> of which every one has twins; <S%H8382><s%> none is bereaved among them. <S%H7909><s%>
Your temples <S%H7541><s%> are like a piece <S%H6400><s%> of a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%> behind <S%H1157><s%> your veil. <S%H6777><s%>
There are sixty <S%H8346><s%> queens, <S%H4436><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> concubines, <S%H6370><s%> and virgins <S%H5959><s%> without number. <S%H4557><s%>

My dove, <S%H3123><s%> my perfect <S%H8535><s%> one, <S%H259><s%> is unique. She is her mother <S%H517><s%>'s only daughter. <S%H259><s%> She is the favorite <S%H1249><s%> one of her who bore <S%H3205><s%> her. <S%H1323><s%> The daughters saw <S%H7200><s%> her, <S%H833><s%> and called her blessed; the queens <S%H4436><s%> and the concubines, <S%H6370><s%> and they praised her. <S%H1984><s%>

Who is she who looks forth <S%H8259><s%> as the morning, <S%H7837><s%> beautiful <S%H3303><s%> as the moon, <S%H3842><s%> clear <S%H1249><s%> as the sun, <S%H2535><s%> and awesome <S%H366><s%> as an army with banners? <S%H1713><s%>

I went down <S%H3381><s%> into the nut <S%H93><s%> tree grove, <S%H1594><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the green plants <S%H3><s%> of the valley, <S%H5158><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> whether the vine <S%H1612><s%> budded, <S%H5132><s%> and the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> were in flower. <S%H5132><s%>
Without realizing <S%H3045><s%> it, <S%H5315><s%> my desire set <S%H7760><s%> me with my royal people <S%H5993><s%>'s chariots. <S%H4818><s%> Friends

Return, <S%H7725><s%> return, <S%H7725><s%> Shulammite! <S%H7759><s%> Return, <S%H7725><s%> return, <S%H7725><s%> that we may gaze <S%H2372><s%> at you. <S%H2372><s%> Lover Why do you desire to gaze at the Shulammite, <S%H7759><s%> as at the dance <S%H4246><s%> of Mahanaim? <S%H4264><s%>
